channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Melania Trump launches new initiative to help children raised in foster system
item.description: Donald Trump signed order creating ‘Foster the Future’ to develop opportunities and online hub for resources Melania Trump, the first lady, is spearhe...

item.title: Trump administration suing Gavin Newsom over California’s voter-approved redistricting plan – live
item.description: Trump’s justice department is attempting to block the state’s new congressional maps , which voters overwhelmingly approved through Proposition 50. US...

item.title: Australia news live: Albanese says Coalition ‘too busy fighting each other’ and have no plan to reduce power prices
item.description: Meanwhile 10 schools closed in ACT after warning about children’s play sand. Follow today’s news live Get our breaking news email , free app or daily ...

item.title: Donald Trump pardons UK billionaire and former Tottenham owner Joe Lewis
item.description: Lewis was fined $5m and given three years probation by New York judge over ‘brazen’ insider trading scheme Joe Lewis, the British billionaire and form...

item.title: Democrat Eric Swalwell faces federal criminal inquiry for alleged mortgage fraud
item.description: Latest target of Trump’s retribution campaign says ‘only thing I am surprised about is that it took him this long’ The Democratic congressman Eric Swa...

item.title: 'Only part of the job done' - Alcaraz seals year-end number one ranking
item.description: Carlos Alcaraz secures the year-end world number one ranking by reaching the knockout stages at the ATP Finals with three straight wins.

item.title: No-fault evictions to be banned in England from May
item.description: The government confirms timeline for reforms to England’s rental market, including ending bidding wars.

item.title: A 'circus' or sign of the times - should Joshua take Paul fight?
item.description: BBC Sport assesses whether Anthony Joshua's prospective fight with YouTuber Jake Paul would be a good or bad idea.

item.title: High Court hears challenge over single sex toilet guidance
item.description: Lawyers say the guidelines are "legally flawed" but equality watchdog denies it breached rights of transgender people.

item.title: Swiss deploy charm offensive in bid to slash crippling Trump tariffs
item.description: Swiss business leaders appear to have made progress with a private initiative in which reports say they brought gifts to the Oval Office.
